title: punish me?
body: so league punishes everything  but  feeders  and  trolls.     i just had a bot lane feed  0/18.  you  punish afk  but  not feeders.   that was 18  deaths  before 20   mins in A RANKED GAME.  what does  riot do?   nothing.    make  people wait  5  10  20 mins for afk  but  wht  if they're not afk and just feed?    you do nothing.     gj riot   thanks for losing me lp.    i'm  sorry   after the feed back  for the original post i need to ammend what i've typed before. my issue is that people feeding in  ranked or any other sort of gameplay is not punished in the same fashion as say  disconnecting  or leaving a game entirely.  i apologize  for any misconception.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=NecromasterQ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V9BanVVA,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-15T01:58:42.120+0000)
>
> so league punishes everything  but  feeders  and  trolls.     i just had a bot lane feed  0/18.  you  punish afk  but  not feeders.   that was 18  deaths  before 20   mins in A RANKED GAME.  what does  riot do?   nothing.    make  people wait  5  10  20 mins for afk  but  wht  if they're not afk and just feed?    you do nothing.     gj riot   thanks for losing me lp.

You know, the problem with making specific claims like this is that your game history is visible to all of us.  You posted about half an hour ago, and your match history shows you've played 11 games today.  **Not one of your games has a botlane with a possible 0/18 pre-20 laning phase.**

[This match](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1730223711/35864146?tab=overview) (which started over 3 1/2 hours ago at the very latest due to game durations) is close, but only has 8 of your ADC/support deaths in lane pre-20.

[This match](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1730413020/35864146?tab=overview) shows an ADC with deaths almost solely in lane and a support with deaths split between bot and mid, but your ADC killed the enemy ADC before 10 minutes so that can't be an 0/18 duo pre-20.  **Interestingly, you went 0/9/0 (no assists!) and gave up the first two kills of the game.**
not the same game.  the game which i was reffering  i won lane   didn't die in lane phase  and killed  1v1  my lane enemy.  nice try
also  you're glossing overr the fact that  not only  ez   died 8 times..  but  the janna who was duo with him died 10 times in  lane phase...

i don't remember them ever  coming mid.   but if they did  they  subsequently  died again on purpose.   which again  makes my point   the fact that these players die  in multiple lanes on purpose is not punished nearly as swiftly as  a d'c.  or just leaving the game entirely...  which i will say is pretty shity..  but if its not  your choice..  is that really  the same?     how is it  ok  to punish  many players  immediately  for a d'c   and not for feeding?

INTERESTINGLY, you  don't  even have the  stats right on  what you're  trying to proclaim.    EZ and janna  died  18  times in that  game  IN LANE PHASE.  then subsequently  3 more times  before game  was  over    scoring only one kill  at, i think 15  deaths between them.   purely  because of  overextending by other team on a tower dive. while  i may be wrong about the 20 minute mark.  lane phase  was still in effect  by the time they left bot lane.  they still fed 18  deaths  between them.  but it still s not the issue.  pick  specifics apart all you want iceweasel   the issue remains.  why not punish  intentional feeding as swiftly as everything else?

I'm not even going to bother picking this all apart, because you only have one game the entire day with an Ezreal on your team, and AP Leona was your support.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1730045712/35864146?tab=overview

They clearly were not doing badly.

If you want to make up stats or games, do it when your full history is not publicly visible.
Losing isn't a punishment, it's a part of the game.  Bans, both temporary and permanent, are punishments.

yes you  can  look back  at  certain games and  pull up any  account  for  peoples games that you  want.   for instance  you  can look back and find in my games that i went 16/1/8  with ww jungle   carried  my team...   also lissandra    carried  multiple times.     but....funny  you  don't mention that?   seems to me you're   pretty self serving  on this topic.

> [{quoted}](name=NecromasterQ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V9BanVVA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-15T04:27:32.293+0000)
>
> yes you  can  look back  at  certain games and  pull up any  account  for  peoples games that you  want.   for instance  you  can look back and find in my games that i went 16/1/8  with ww jungle   carried  my team...   also lissandra    carried  multiple times.     but....funny  you  don't mention that?   seems to me you're   pretty self serving  on this topic.

Not self-serving in the least.  It's logic.  Here's why:
> [{quoted}](name=NecromasterQ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V9BanVVA,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-15T01:58:42.120+0000)
>
> i just had a bot lane feed  0/18.  you  punish afk  but  not feeders.   that was 18  deaths  before 20   mins in A RANKED GAME...gj riot thanks for losing me lp.

You made that claim.  You.

I looked at every one of your games from the day in which you "just had a bot lane feed 0/18."  Your other games where you had a good score are irrelevant to the topic.

Objectively, the games that *are* relevant are the ones in which your botlane did poorly ("18  deaths  before 20 mins in A RANKED GAME") and you lost ("gj riot thanks for losing me lp.").  Do you know why?  They help establish whether or not you're a reliable narrator.  If you had a recent game that had a 0/18 botlane by the 20 minute mark, you might've been telling the truth.

**Not a single one of them backed up your claim.**  Not only did you exaggerate your teammates' poor performance by *a lot*, but your own performance is pretty suspicious.  How often does a champ with a global ult not manage to get a single assist?  You claimed that other people on your team were feeding, but since you died more than once before their first deaths in the game with the closest match to your story *and* they managed a larger than 0% kill participation (which you did not), I'm not sure you can blame your loss on *them* feeding.

not a single  one of what?   are you  kidding?   let us establish this iceweasel. you're saying not one of my games in my recent or any other  history backs up my claim of having intentional feeders?  have you watched everyone one of these games ?  good and bad?   or  are you just  positioning yourself on the stats you can see?    have you  investigated  reports on the players  i'm accusing of this action?  or just  me  because i'm typing about the issue?   further,  you're stating that the only games that back up my claims are about  JUST BOT LANE.  this is also false as i play all roles.  and  it's  not JUST BOT LANE  that i am stating, feeds.   its all roles.   or don't back up my claims.    I am interested in realizing you're  view  on this subject considering it's only me you're picking apart and not  others.   this is  a  game wide issue. many other players have the same problem.  why not address  that?

> [{quoted}](name=NecromasterQ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V9BanVVA,comment-id=000400000001,timestamp=2015-02-15T06:04:42.522+0000)
>
> not a single  one of what?   are you  kidding?   let us establish this iceweasel. you're saying not one of my games in my recent or any other  history backs up my claim of having intentional feeders?  have you watched everyone one of these games ?  good and bad?   or  are you just  positioning yourself on the stats you can see?    have you  investigated  reports on the players  i'm accusing of this action?  or just  me  because i'm typing about the issue?   further,  you're stating that the only games that back up my claims are about  JUST BOT LANE.  this is also false as i play all roles.  and  it's  not JUST BOT LANE  that i am stating, feeds.   its all roles.   or don't back up my claims.    I am interested in realizing you're  view  on this subject considering it's only me you're picking apart and not  others.   this is  a  game wide issue. many other players have the same problem.  why not address  that?

I'm addressing the fact that you claim it had "just happened."

I'm going to do this again since you seem to be forgetful:

> [{quoted}](name=NecromasterQ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V9BanVVA,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-15T01:58:42.120+0000)
>
> so league punishes everything  but  feeders  and  trolls.     **i just had a bot lane feed  0/18.**  you  punish afk  but  not feeders.   **that was 18  deaths  before 20   mins in A RANKED GAME.**  what does  riot do?   nothing.    make  people wait  5  10  20 mins for afk  but  wht  if they're not afk and just feed?    you do nothing.     **gj riot   thanks for losing me lp.**

See the bold part?  You're the one who specifically claimed that you "just had a bot lane feed 0/18...before 20 mins in A RANKED GAME...thanks for losing me lp."

This means your argument relies on:

* you having a botlane that fed 0/18
* the 0/18 score being achieved before 20 minutes
* you losing the game
* the game being very recent

I'll repeat that again since I know you're going to ask why I am focused on your botlane.

**You blamed your 0/18 pre-20 minute botlane for your loss.**

Here's what your match history shows for the 11 games played that day before your post:

* Zero games with a 0/18 pre-20 minute botlane
* Two games with a struggling botlane

I don't need to see a replay of your games to know that.  The match history shows deaths, kills, locations, and approximate times of each.  Considering your wording ("just had"), the game in question had to have happened very recently, thus the limitation of games on the same day.  The most recent game at the time of your post was your Blitzcrank win.  **You only had two games with heavy losses in your botlane, which I linked.**

In the game at least 3 1/2 hours before your original post, your botlane's relevant stats were:

* ADC: 4/16/7
* Support: 9/12/9
* Combined KDA at 20 minutes: 1/7/?
* Timestamp for 18 deaths reached: beyond 33 minutes with 5/19/? 
* Majority of deaths occurred after laning phase, scattered around the map

In the other game I linked, which was your most recent loss at the time of your post, your botlane's relevant stats were:

* ADC: 2/8/1
* Support: 2/9/2
* Combined KDA at 20 minutes: 3/11/?
* Timestamp for 18 deaths reached: Never
* 75% of ADC's deaths occurred in lane
* Over half of support's deaths occurred in lane

This game seems like the most likely candidate for the game you were describing in your original post.  Here's why:

* It was the most recent loss
* It was shorter, with a decisive end before 25 minutes
* Most of your botlane's deaths happened *in the botlane*
* Total botlane deaths (17) is almost the 18 you stated
* Total botlane deaths were closer to 18 at 20 minutes
* Your botlane ended with only 4 kills total, which is closer to 0 than the other game's botlane (13)

So to answer your question, when I say not a single one of your games backs up your claim, I'm talking about the fact that **not a single one of your games actually has a botlane that does what you said**.  Do you understand?  If you claimed your botlane fed 0/18 before 20 minutes and none of your games show that happening, then **none of your games back up your claim**.  I never said you had no feeders in your game, because there was definitely at least one.

* Total KDA: 0/9/0
* You gave first blood *and* second blood
* Total Damage to Champions: 1.0k (support dealt 5.5x that amount)
* Magic Damage to Champions: 0.1k (100 magic damage total with Gangplank?)
* Minions Killed: 13 (If you were playing support this would be understandable, but you were top)

Of course you want to blame someone *else* for feeding to excuse your loss.  It couldn't have been you, could it?

Except it's blatantly obvious that it was.

so  one game whether exaggerated or not is not my  main issue.  though, you seem intent on picking it apart. the issue i've tried to address is that  a d'c or  a leave is punished  immediately now.  with  longer and  longer que times.  ok  cool.  i agree with this.  but  intentional feeding is not punished in nearly  the same manner.  why not?  it is just as bad as leaving a game entirely.  so  you're punished for leaving a game.  not playing at all..    but not for   running into lane and  giving  deaths arbitrarily all game.  why not?  its worse.

not a single  one of what?   are you  kidding?   let us establish this iceweasel. you're saying not one of my games in my recent or any other  history backs up my claim of having intentional feeders?  have you watched everyone one of these games ?  good and bad?   or  are you just  positioning yourself on the stats you can see?    have you  investigated  reports on the players  i'm accusing of this action?  or just  me  because i'm typing about the issue?   funny
I have this odd feeling that you scream at your teams a lot.
Yea i feel like i wouldn't want him on my team.

seems like i scream at people a lot.   lol    you realiz this is typing right? i can't scream at anyone.  i  always  give positive reinforcement  for  good plays.    sometimes, like everyone,  i can be accused fairly  of  being toxic.    but i try not to type  while playing.    i understand  its not  conducive to  put down fellow players.   but if they  die over and over   knowing they can't  win....? what is that like religion.?  we  know its wrong  but cant speak of it... or punish it?     seems  pretty  shity to me

> [{quoted}](name=NecromasterQ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V9BanVVA,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-15T04:37:03.997+0000)
>
> seems like i scream at people a lot.   lol    you realiz this is typing right? i can't scream at anyone.

Semantics.  You know what people mean.

> sometimes, like everyone,  i can be accused fairly  of  being toxic.

Argumentum ad populum.  No, not everyone acts that way.  Some people prefer not to unzip and water their teammates even if they're unskilled players.

some people also prefer to play a game where  people are treated fairly.    as league of legends has progressed so far...  maybe  a bit further  is my main topic..   but... as  always  you, who are so deep into you're own bs,   choose to gloss over the topic

my games are  visible?   good   look through them...  its too bad that you can't actually   watch the matches.   see the people feeding  again over and over.   and making me lose games.  as well as many others.   but never   are these people punished as  swiftly.

my punishment  for  a d/c   is i'm  sent to a "lower priority queu"   but   people cn get away with feeding 9 -11 kills  intentionaly  in ranked play is...  "oh...well  we'll consider punishment"  my punishment  for my  unfortunate  situation is immediate and  unforgiving.    but theirs is  "we'll think about it"      this is  so far beyond the bounds of justice.
